content: step into the magical world of holiday cheer with our knitted dog elf hat the perfect accessory to sprinkle festive joy on your furry friend this is an advanced beginner knitting pattern and the techniques involved are casting on knitting and purl stitches knitting in the round k2tog and changing colors this classic holiday hat can be knit in five sizes yarn you will need three colors of yarn 1 ball of each color or see the estimated yards below for each size yarn a - green yarn b - white yarn c - red the yarn weight is bulky/chunky/12 ply estimated yards needed for each size extra small - 48 yds small- 58 yds medium - 70 yds large - 92 yds extra large - 106 yds needles set of 6 mm us 10 40 cm/16 circular knitting needles skills level easy this is an easy-level knitting pattern and the techniques involved are the knit stitch purl stitch increasing decreasing changing colors and working in the round sizing xs - extra small - 13-15 s - small - 15-18 m - medium - 19-21 l - large - 22-24 xl - extra large - 24-26 don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information
